summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the General Services Department, authorizing payment of the difference in salary rates of Intermediate Clerk, second step, and Senior Clerk for the period from October 18, 1973 through April 3, 1974 to Ms. Shirley A. Schattenkerk, and authorizing payment of the additional pension contribution therefor to the City Employees' Retirement System; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
